MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 09.27am in the LL18 postcode area of Trelawynd following reports of a low overhead conductor. This may affect the supply to your property. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely possible by 11.30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 09.27am on 22nd April 2021.
